# iparcelboxpy
Python wrapper for the iParcelBox Local API 

[View on PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/iParcelBoxPY/)

# Features

[iParcelBox API Documentation](https://www.iparcelbox.com/local-api-instructions/)


## Supported

- Get Status
- Get Info
- Lock Box
- Empty Box
- Allow Deliver

## Not yet supported

- All other functions
